Hello, I am Xin Zhang (prounounciation ≈ "shin chang"), a Ph.D student in computer science. I have been working with Prof. Mayur Naik since I joined Georgia Tech in 2011. Right before that, I received my Bachelor degree in Software Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I have broad interests in topics related to programming languages, software engineering and operating systems. For more details, please refer to Research.

I will serve on the external review committee of PLDI'17.

New paper at OOPSLA'16 on accelerating program analyses by reusing their results on shared library code.

New paper at CP'16 on incremental MaxSAT solving.
